title: Help sourcing a supplier of pear laminate ply.

posts.content:
Hi
I recently purchased an interior cupboard set from a campervan conversion specialist and now want to make barn door cupboards to my spec using a similar material - 9mm pear laminate ply.
I asked the specialist where he got his from and surprise surprise he didn't respond!
Any one help?
Regards

Try again...and tell him you are posting the thread of your pleasure with his interior with his details on the SSVC forum...

Or otherwise..

Phone though not mail...

LOL

Thanks for the responses so far.
I can almost understand his reluctance to provide the information but, working on the theory that any publicity is, well publicity, I'd rather not give him the benefit of the doubt and bring attention to him.
I will persevere in my quest to find a supplier; afterall, it shouldn't be that difficult..................
